name: Pugs Slice Pumpkins
description:
Pugs will slice all those pumpins!

Control Knife Pug with Arrow Keys

Control Other Pug with WASD

1. Slice up Pumpkin

2. Get glowing pumpkin lamp with the other pug

3. Defeat the ghosts while you have the lamp

Credits:
